summary.para: Gets the bounds of the metafile, in device-independent pixels (DIPs), as reported in the metafile’s header.

param.name: bounds
param.para: The bounds, in DIPs, of the metafile.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

item.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

summary.para: This method streams the contents of the command to the given metafile sink.

param.name: sink
param.para: The sink into which Direct2D will call back.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

item.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

summary.para: A Direct2D resource that wraps a WMF, EMF, or EMF+ metafile.
